passage.title: Edie and the clown school
passage.paragraph: One day Edie tells his mom that he wants to go to the clown school. "Mom, I'm going to the clown school, but my clothes are not suitable. Can you help me?"
Mom looks at Edie and says, "OK, let me help you." Then she helps Edie put on the uniform and make his mouth bigger. After that she paints a tear under one of his eyes and gives him a red nose.
Edie looks at himself in the mirror. He is happy and walks to the clown school with a smile.
